channel.title: [pi] npc indentifier
channel.description: Hello there, I am looking to add npc indentifier.. Not sure if that's what it's called, but i'll explain... What i'm looking for is; To be able to identify any NPC by right-clicking on the NPC, then show's the NPC ID. I thought it would be much easier to add this since I am moving NPC's around a lot. I am looking to remove some that's just bloating the server so yeah. Any help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: [pi] npc indentifier
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Thanks guys. Got it !

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] npc indentifier
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is in your client…

Look for:
buildAtNPCMenu
Within that method, you need to find the “menuActionName” that you want the npc ID to display next to, then edit it in.

Ex:

if (itemSelected == 1) { menuActionName[menuActionRow] = "Use " + selectedItemName + " with @yel@" + s; menuActionID[menuActionRow] = 582; menuActionCmd1[menuActionRow] = i; menuActionCmd2[menuActionRow] = k; menuActionCmd3[menuActionRow] = j; menuActionRow++; return; }
^That is only drawn if a user has an item selected in their inventory and they right click the npc.
You’d add “+ entityDef.id” after the s for the menuactionname. (Assuming the variables are named the same).

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] npc indentifier
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Hello there, I am looking to add npc indentifier… Not sure if that’s what it’s called, but i’ll explain…
What i’m looking for is; To be able to identify any NPC by right-clicking on the NPC, then show’s the NPC ID.
I thought it would be much easier to add this since I am moving NPC’s around a lot.
I am looking to remove some that’s just bloating the server so yeah.
Any help is greatly appreciated.
